SEARCH
Package pt.uc.dei.dtos

Class CreateAppraisalDTO

java.lang.Object
pt.uc.dei.dtos.CreateAppraisalDTO
public class CreateAppraisalDTO extends Object
Data Transfer Object (DTO) for creating a new appraisal. Contains only the fields necessary for appraisal creation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private @NotNull(message="Appraised user ID is required") Long
    appraisedUserId
    The ID of the user being appraised.
    private @NotNull(message="Appraising user ID is required") Long
    appraisingUserId
    The ID of the user performing the appraisal.
    private @NotNull(message="Cycle ID is required") Long
    cycleId
    The ID of the cycle in which the appraisal occurs.
    private @NotBlank(message="Feedback is required") String
    feedback
    The feedback provided by the appraising user.
    private @NotNull(message="Score is required") @Min(value=1L,message="Score must be at least 1") @Max(value=4L,message="Score must be at most 4") Integer
    score
    The score assigned during the appraisal (1-4 stars).

    • cycleId

    • score

      @NotNull(message="Score is required") @Min(value=1L, message="Score must be at least 1") @Max(value=4L, message="Score must be at most 4") private @NotNull(message="Score is required") @Min(value=1L,message="Score must be at least 1") @Max(value=4L,message="Score must be at most 4") Integer score
      The score assigned during the appraisal (1-4 stars). Must be between 1 and 4.
